name: F01080-005 – DHR Consolidation - Rev.01
sql_for_additional_access: select user_id from [BsWebService].[dbo].[activeEmployees] where (company='BIT Singapore' and ([function]='Quality' or [function]='Operations' or [function]='Manufacturing')) or user_id in (SELECT [user_id]   FROM [BsWebService].[dbo].[bpm_admin])

data_configuration.name: Associate  Template Families
data_configuration.sql_statement: select 'F01080-004 – DHR QC Confirmation' as qc_cfm_family

data_configuration.name: Find QC Confirmation ID by Order No
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select top 1 p.id as process_id
from [dbo].[bpm_process_detail] d
inner join [dbo].[bpm_process_matrix] m 
	on d.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.type='initiator' 
		and d.label='Order No' 
		and d.value='$$order_no'
inner join [dbo].[bpm_process] p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn = p.revn
and p.status='close' 
inner join [dbo].[bpm_process_template] t 
on p.process_template_id=t.id 
and t.name like '$$qc_cfm_tmpl'+'%'
order by p.last_update desc

data_configuration.name: Production Order List
Extract Order No from Order Display Text
QC Confirmation Header Data By Process ID
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select d.label,d.value,e.first_name+' '+e.last_name+' ('+e.user_id+')'  as qa_completed_by,p.close_on as qa_completed_on
			from  [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].[func_get_all_employees](DEFAULT) e on p.initiate_by=e.user_id
				and p.id='$$qc_cfm_id'
				--and p.id='qc-cfm-01-20231027150354'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
		[Production Confirmation ID], 
		[Order No],
        [Material], 
        [Material Description], 
        [Store Location], 
        [Plan Qty], 
        [Batch No], 
        [Start Date], 
        [Revision], 
        [Drawing Number], 
        [Alt BOM], 
        [Drawing Rev#], 
        [End Date], [Remarks],
        [Production Line], 
        [Production Line Sub-group],
		
		[QTY Prod Finished],
		[QTY Prod Rejected],
		[QTY Prod Tested],
		[Remark from Production Confirmation],
		[Production Applied Labour],
		[Job Order Start],
		[Job Order Finish],
		[Total Submitted Qty],
		[Production Rejected Qty],
		[QC Rejected Qty],
		[QC destructive Qty],
		[Released Qty],
		[QC Confirmation Remark]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Find PO Item List by PID
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]			
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$qc_cfm_id'
				--and p.id='qc-cfm-01-20230814163621'
				and d.label='PO Item List'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
			[Item Cat],
			[SS],
			[Item Code],
			[Item Code Desc],
			[Quantity],
			[Unit],
			[Batch/Serial No],
			[Qty Actual],
			[SLED],
			[Sloc],
			[Alt Gp],
			[AltG Pr]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Find Prod Total Qty Summary by PID
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]			
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$qc_cfm_id'
				 --and p.id='qc-cfm-01-20230814163621'
				and d.label='Total Qty Summary'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Station],
				[Plan Qty],
				[Accept Qty], 
				[Reject Qty],
				[Test Qty],
				[Station Total],
				[Station Total - Last Accept Qty],
				[Last Update On]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Find Prod Total Qty Breakdown by PID
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]			
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$qc_cfm_id'
				 --and p.id='qc-cfm-01-20230815161607'
				and d.label='Total Qty Breakdown'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Station],
				[Shift],
				[Plan Qty], 
				[Accept Qty], 
				[Reject Qty],
				[Test Qty],
				[Shift Total],
				[Initiated By],
				[Completion Date],
				[Verified By],
				[Verified On],
				[Process ID],
				[Process Url]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Find QC Test Items Detail by PID
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]			
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$qc_cfm_id'
				 --and p.id='qc-cfm-01-20230821124218'
				and d.label='QC Test Items Summary'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Shift],
				[Test Item],
				[Test Qty], 
				[Destructive],
				[Destructive Test Qty],
				[Pass/Fail],
				[Remark],
				[Process Url],
				[Process ID],
				[Performed By],
				[Performed Date],
				[Verified By],
				[Verified On]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Find QC Test Qty by Shift by PID
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]			
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$qc_cfm_id'
				 --and p.id='qc-cfm-01-20230815161607'
				and d.label='Total QC test Qty summary'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Shift],
				[Reject Qty],
				[Total Test Qty], 
				[Total Destructive Test Qty],
				[Remark / NCIR / Test],
				[Process Url],
				[Process ID],
				[Performed By],
				[Performed Date],
				[Verified By],
				[Verified On]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Find Mat Iss Attachment List by PID
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]			
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$qc_cfm_id'
				--and p.id='qc-cfm-01-20230814163621'
				and d.label='Material Issuance Attachment List'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
			[Attachment Name],
			[Attachment Url],
			[Upload By],
			[Update On]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Find QC Confirmation Attachment List by Order No
data_configuration.sql_statement: exec [dbo].[DHR_attachment_by_order_no] '$$QC_Confirmation_template','$$order_no','Previous QC Confirmation Attachment List'

data_configuration.name: Auto Populated Subject
data_configuration.sql_statement: {value:"Consolidated_$$material"+"_"+"$$batchNo"}

data_configuration.name: Consolidation of eDHR report
Update other consolidation process with same order no to cancel
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [dbo].[DHR_update_process_status_with_the_same_order_no] 'exclude','cancel','@@matrix_id'

data_configuration.name: Find Production Confirmed By and Date
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select e.first_name+' '+e.last_name+' ('+e.user_id+')' as prod_cfm_by,close_on as prod_cfm_on from [dbo].[bpm_process] p
 inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].[func_get_all_employees](DEFAULT) e on p.initiate_by=e.user_id
where id='$$prod_cfm_id' and status='close'
